title: Coloris
info:
This is a ripped and slightly altered version of a title music from Coloris game (1990, Avesoft). The song is made by Walkman though some minor edits are made for this version used in the demo.

In the end of the demo, the music credits for this section are attributed to "unknown", suggesting that Budbrain was no aware about the origins of the song. nemesis1 is mentioned as ripper in modarchive.
